Cr\u00e9neau: Ouv 2 MSem 1 MS/Sem 3 MSem 2 MS/Sem 4 MSem 4 M
Pr\u00e9requis: Etre inscrit au Mastère Spécialisé "Infrastructure Project Finance"
Objectifs du module: - To give participants the most used mathematical skills to use Excel for general purpose and to import and export data from and forward other software or tools. - To make participants able to understand and adapt macro functions found in tutorials
Programme du module: - Training with most used mathematical formulas; - Importing, exporting and converting data; - Analysing large amount of data with statistical tools - Employing mathematical formulas in modelling skills Mathematical skills 50% data analyse 50%
